Package gov.tak.api.engine.map.features

Class Polygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.tak.api.engine.map.features.Geometry
      • gov.tak.api.engine.map.features.Polygon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable
    public final class Polygon
extends Geometry
    An arbitrary shape made of a exterior ring which is a closed line string. Optional interior rings which are closed line strings can represent "holes" inside in the shape.

    Note: The polygon is malformed if any of its rings are not closed.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class gov.tak.api.engine.map.features.Geometry

        impl

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Polygon()
      Creates a new polygon with a default dimension of '2'.
      Polygon​(int dimension)
      Creates a new polygon with a specified dimension of '2' or '3'.
      Polygon​(LineString exteriorRing)
      Creates a new polygon with its exterior ring initialized as a copy of 'exteriorRing'.
      Polygon​(LineString exteriorRing, java.util.Collection<LineString> interiorRings)
      Creates a new polygon with its exterior ring initialized as a copy of 'exteriorRing' and interior rings initialized as a copy of interiorRings.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Polygon

        public Polygon()
        Creates a new polygon with a default dimension of '2'.

      • Polygon

        public Polygon​(int dimension)
        Creates a new polygon with a specified dimension of '2' or '3'.
        Parameters:
        dimension - the dimension of '2' or '3'
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if dimension is illegal

      • Polygon

        public Polygon​(LineString exteriorRing)
        Creates a new polygon with its exterior ring initialized as a copy of 'exteriorRing'. The dimension of the polygon will be adopted from 'exteriorRing'.
        Parameters:
        exteriorRing - the exterior ring line string
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if ring is malformed

      • Polygon

        public Polygon​(LineString exteriorRing,
               java.util.Collection<LineString> interiorRings)
        Creates a new polygon with its exterior ring initialized as a copy of 'exteriorRing' and interior rings initialized as a copy of interiorRings. The dimension of the polygon will be adopted from 'exteriorRing'.
        Parameters:
        exteriorRing - the exterior ring line string
        interiorRings - the interior rings of the polygon
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any ring is malformed

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Resets the polygon to an empty polygon. All points in the exterior ring are removed and all interior rings are removed.

      • getInteriorRings

        public java.util.Collection<LineString> getInteriorRings()
        Returns the interior rings collections
